ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: You can teach someone  to one better than your current  skill, long as you re grouped and in the same zone. I ve got chars there, MANY languages, want  to work
ygData.messageBody:
You can teach someone to one better than your current skill, long as
you're grouped and in the same zone. I've got chars there, MANY languages,
want to work together some time? You can also spam back and forth with
multiple ppl so that you can go from one person with skill 1 to everyone
in group at skill 100 if you're patient.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kittin LovesYou <KittinLovesYou@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 07, 2003 3:32 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Languages


> I was curious what has changed about the languages. I used to be able to
teach a language to my group and get better at it. This is no longer so,
and I talked to a GM who told me this was never so. I was also told that
something changed in respect to languages and zoning or something. I am
quite curious about this, as I am trying to learn every language I can. I
was also curious if you could teach over your own knowledge in the language.
Thank you in advance for your replies.
> Adimisha Elvintide
> Rodcet Nife server
